dict.acceptation: 乳房，乳腺；胸脯，胸部；心窝，胸怀；
升高，攀登；坚毅地面对，与…搏斗；挺胸迎…而上；

sent.orig: Clinics scope: Breast mastitis ·breast milk painbreast droop · breast deformities ·breast hyperplasia ·breast dysplasia.
sent.trans: 诊疗范围：·乳腺炎·乳腺结核·乳痛症·乳腺纤维瘤·乳房畸形·乳房下垂·乳腺增生·乳房发育不良。

sent.orig: Thorough clinical breast exam involves inspection and palpation of all breast tissue including lymph node basins.
sent.trans: 完整的临床乳腺检查包括对淋巴结在内的整个乳腺组织进行检查和触诊。

sent.orig: What causes breast calcifications? Are they associated with breast cancer?
sent.trans: 乳房钙化的原因是什麽？它们和癌症之间有什麽关系吗？

sent.orig: Abnormality of breast cancer susceptibility gene (BRCA) is of great significance, especially in of breast cancer.
sent.trans: 乳腺癌易感基因，尤其是BRCA的异常在乳腺癌发病中更具意义。

sent.orig: Women often worry that patients with breast reconstruction after breast cancer recurrence.
sent.trans: 常有女患者担心乳房重建后会导致乳腺癌复发。
